thread.section_title: Le 123 Sebastopol - Astotel - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great room and amenities
thread.title_full: Great room and amenities - Review of Le 123 Sebastopol - Astotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: GiuliaZRH
title: Great room and amenities
text:
Beautiful stylish and different boutique-style hotel in Paris. We had a double room with a balcony and it was spacious and beautifully decorated. We had a coffee machine in our room and all the drinks in the minibar are complimentary, so we enjoyed our refreshments on the wonderful little balcony overlooking the square. The staff is very friendly, you get free afternoon tea and cake at all their hotels in Paris and the breakfast is sumptuous! A wonderful experience!
Oh and the beds are great and the windows make sure no sound comes through from the main road even though we were facing it.
